>
[Smoke Fan](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1119)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Gadget" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=405" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 71</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access**  Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you Activate a smoke fan, it creates a cloud of colored smoke. The smoke fills a 5-foot radius. The creator chooses the smoke's color when creating the smoke fan. Creatures within the smoke's area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dissipated by a strong wind.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"

>
Smoke Fan (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The smoke's radius is 20 feet, and the creator can choose for the smoke to be a mixture of colors.
